page.title: 14EGGINTON SCHOOL BUILDING
page.content: The school is built of bricks and some bits look newer than others. The school is very small. It is 17.20 metres long and 17 metres wide. In the upper juniors' class room there is a war memorial with the names of the people who were killed on it. There is a wreath of poppies next to it. The lower juniors' classroom is the canteen as well. The hall has some P.E. apparatus. The school has a little garden in which we plant flower and vegetable seeds. I have never been to another school and I like this school because it is so small and you can't get lost. Rachel Smith
